To start working with an existing Maven project, please go to the File/Open Project... menu item. You will be presented with an enhanced FileChooser, where you should select the project's directory. Directories that contain projects of any type recoginized by the IDE, will be specially marked. Selecting the folder will give you additional information, like the project's name. For maven projects that define the maven.multiproject properties, the other projects will be shown and offered to be opened.
